verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> Shir, A Song לַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> lam-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees אֶשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> 'es-Sa I will lift up עֵ֭ינַי <WH5869> 'Ei-nai mine eyes אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הֶהָרִ֑ים <WH2022> he-ha-Rim; unto the hills מֵ֝אַ֗יִן <WH370> me-'A-yin, from whence יָבֹ֥א <WH935> ya-Vo cometh עֶזְרִֽי׃ <WH5828> 'ez-Ri. my help

עֶ֭זְרִי <WH5828> 'Ez-ri My help מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> me-'Im from יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; [cometh] from the LORD עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh, which made שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> va-'A-retz. and earth

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit-Ten He will not suffer לַמּ֣וֹט <WH4132> lam-Mot to be moved רַגְלֶ֑ךָ <WH7272> rag-Le-cha; thy foot אַל־ <WH408> 'al- shall not יָ֝נ֗וּם <WH5123> ya-Num, thee will not slumber שֹֽׁמְרֶֽךָ׃ <WH8104> Sho-me-Re-cha. he that keepeth

הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- will neither יָ֭נוּם <WH5123> Ya-num shall neither slumber וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor יִישָׁ֑ן <WH3462> yi-Shan; nor sleep שׁ֝וֹמֵ֗ר <WH8104> v-Mer, Behold he that keepeth יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. Israel

יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD שֹׁמְרֶ֑ךָ <WH8104> sho-me-Re-cha; [is] thy keeper יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צִ֝לְּךָ֗ <WH6738> tzil-le-cha, [is] thy shade עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and יַ֥ד <WH3027> yad hand יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> ye-mi-Ne-cha. upon thy right

יוֹמָ֗ם <WH3119> yo-Mam, thee by day הַשֶּׁ֥מֶשׁ <WH8121> hash-She-mesh The sun לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor יַכֶּ֗כָּה <WH5221> yak-Kek-kah, shall not smite וְיָרֵ֥חַ <WH3394> ve-ya-Re-ach nor the moon בַּלָּֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> bal-La-ye-lah. by night

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD יִשְׁמָרְךָ֥ <WH8104> yish-ma-re-Cha shall preserve מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all רָ֑ע <WH7451> Ra'; thee from all evil יִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר <WH8104> yish-Mor, he shall preserve אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> naf-She-cha. thy soul

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD יִשְׁמָר־ <WH8104> yish-mor- shall preserve צֵאתְךָ֥ <WH3318> tze-te-Cha thy going out וּבוֹאֶ֑ךָ <WH935> u-vo-'E-cha; and thy coming in מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> me-'at-Tah, this וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- from this time forth and even for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. evermore
